TopicTitle: Looking for a mod that allows switching vessels in atmo/while moving

Articles.Content:
As the title says, ive looked around here, spaceport, and Google, and i just cant find a mod that would allow me to switch vessels mid-flight.

I could use this for 2 reasons:

I need the ability in MP to switch away from a controlled vessel. Nothing is more aggravating then being stuck forced to spec someone (or need to rejoin server), especially when it happens after you crash and you get switched to spectate somoene else with no ability to do anything whatsoever.

I would like the ability to autopilot a craft (say set it in a heading and have it just keep flying), as id lieki to test some mid-air combat, ive seen peopel do it in vids, but i seem unable to actually achieve this yet!

Finally, itd be nice if DMP added the ability to isnatntly go to space center regardless of what is happening, but until then, such a mod would be plenty.
